lines.text:
[Narrating]
It was finally over. Paula gave an extraordinary floor show. My nuts applauded her and then my dick gave her a standing ovation.
So tell me. How is business anyway?
Ah, it's the same old shit. You know, Rob and Peter to pay Paul. But listen, I don't wanna talk about all that right know. Got other things on my mind I'd like to do? You know what I mean?
Oh yeah! Well, could we just do it on the desk this time? I always wanted an executive position.
